/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, symbols of the city's constant movement, are scattered throughout the scene, while pedestrians add a human element to the urban tableau. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of complexity to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
